comments.body:
Can you add an overview of what this page is supposed to be about?  By the title it seems like it is how to update the docs, but that's actually just a link here to a different doc.

The other sections are kind of ad-hoc and not really fleshed out in terms of how someone reading _this_ doc should use them,

docs-doc is not well written :(

Thanks Brendan.  Let me know if you think what I have now is sufficient.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +28,32 @@<!-- END MUNGE: UNVERSIONED_WARNING -->

# How to update docs for new kubernetes features

This document describes things to consider when updating Kubernetes docs for new features or changes to existing features (including removing features).
